verses.name: Matthew 11:1
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples, he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities.

verses.name: Matthew 11:2
verses.text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ, he sent two of his disciples,

verses.name: Matthew 11:3
verses.text: And said unto him, Art thou he that should come, or do we look for another?

verses.name: Matthew 11:4
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see:
